title: Please can I come tomorrow? (TEFC)
brief_description: A child is not born with a comprehension of miracles. Education should be tailored to his level of comprehension - his experiences with play and people. This film examines nursery school in some depth to see how a child in particular and society as a whole can benefit from them.
